definition: double/twice/simultaneous/holding two or more (official) posts at the same time
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: There, you have compatibility across the board.
sentences.chinese: 因爲它擁有跨平臺的兼容性。

sentences.english: A major number indicates a potential incompatibility between library versions.
sentences.chinese: 主版本號表明程序庫版本之間的潛在不兼容性。

sentences.english: It will deliver innovative new features while focusing on application and device compatibility.
sentences.chinese: 它將帶給大家全新的兼容性更強的新功能。

sentences.english: This version resolved most problems such as uninstallation and stability.
sentences.chinese: 這個版本解決了大多數例如卸載和兼容性的問題。

sentences.english: Ah, the price for cross-platform compatibility.)
sentences.chinese: 這就是跨平臺兼容性的代價。

sentences.english: It turned out that the site's two major influences were compatibility and appearance.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明影響該站點的兩個主要因素是兼容性和外觀。

sentences.english: Such incompatibilities are noted throughout the tutorial.
sentences.chinese: 本教程注意到了這種不兼容性。

sentences.english: A few side effect may introduce to affect the compatability of a few games.
sentences.chinese: 這句是說有些副作用也許會影響到一些遊戲的兼容性。

sentences.english: Again, the answer lies in backward compatibility.
sentences.chinese: 答案同樣是因爲向後兼容性。

sentences.english: If you don’t need this compatibility, you should disable it.
sentences.chinese: 如果您不需要這種兼容性，則應該禁用它。

sentences.english: The first driving factor for the site was backward compatibility with older browsers.
sentences.chinese: 該站點的第一個決定因素是對舊瀏覽器的向後兼容性。
爲什麼存在二進制不兼容性？

sentences.english: Backward compatibility will be removed in version 9.
sentences.chinese: 向下兼容性將在9版本中移除。

sentences.english: Stunning 3D effect, high brightness, wide viewing angle, good compatibility.
sentences.chinese: 立體感強，亮度高，視角寬，兼容性強。

sentences.english: In contrast, haploidy seems less compatible with development in mammals.
sentences.chinese: 相反的，哺乳動物的單倍體似乎與發育的兼容性較差。

sentences.english: A standardized programming model should be introduced to avoid technology incompatibility problems.
sentences.chinese: 應該引入標準化編程模型來避免技術不兼容性問題。
